column4: D i cannot see the shared linux files on the windows machine any ideas ?
samba is running i can see the linux machine
but i cannot access the files on the linux machine
make sure you have allowed browsing in System>Administration>Shared folders on Linux
Is the domain the same on both?
And Windows is also on MSHOME?
do you have an url like this? http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/5127
yes - you could run "sudo gedit /etc/samba/smb.conf" change it and then click save
it is in the topic of this channel
you need to remove the ";" at the beginning of the line.
